amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to carry out seismic airgun testing or surveys off the coast of Florida.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to carry out seismic airgun testing or surveys off the coast of Florida.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A090) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
